meanings.definition: A synthetic antibacterial drug used to treat various infections.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed trimethoprims to help fight the infection.
meanings.sent2: I picked up the trimethoprims from the pharmacy for my illness.
meanings.sent3: The bacteria were no match for the powerful trimethoprims!
meanings.sent4: Her body was a battlefield, and trimethoprims were the brave soldiers fighting the invaders.
meanings.sent5: The trimethoprims worked like tiny warriors, attacking the harmful bacteria.
